content:
Hi there, I was wondering if someone could please help me with git rebase? I am working on my first PR for rust-lang/rust, but I've managed to add a merge commit into the branch.
Should I run git rebase -i master again to remove it?

PR here https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/89199
A rebase should automatically remove merge commits, you don't even have to use interactive mode.
but sure, if you want to selectively squash them that can also be done in interactive mode
Oh wow I've completely mucked this up
